thread.title: Head Athletic Trainer - College Sports

title: Head Athletic Trainer - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Head Athletic Trainer Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Provides leadership and direction for the colleges student-athlete health care. Manages the athletic training staff, consisting of one full time assistant, and two graduate assistants..   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
